live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
We continue to look for resolution in the area.
Our teams are looking into it. We anticipate that services will be restored by 7:00 PM
35726.summary: Some customer in West Lethbridge surrounding Laval Park are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35726.title: Apr 2 - West Lethbridge (Laval Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
